Class DirectoryManagerServiceClient

java.lang.Object
  ManagerServiceClient
      com.adobe.livecycle.usermanager.client.DirectoryManagerServiceClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
DirectoryManager
public class DirectoryManagerServiceClient
extends ManagerServiceClient
implements DirectoryManager

This is the client implementation of the DirectoryManager class.

See Also:
DirectoryManager

Updates a list of exceptions of Allowed Referers for which a request will be blocked. If list doesn't exists than it creates a new one.

Specified by:
updateAllowedRefererExceptions in interface DirectoryManager
Parameters:
listId - A java.lang.String id that identifies the List.
allowedURIs - A java.uitl.List of all Allowed Referer Exceptions
Throws:
UMException
